query: Generate test cases for the functionality shown in the uploaded image Screenshot 2025-12-22 at 10.52.24 AM.png
context_preview:
[Document 1] C:\Users\HP\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpkkuhxgvj.pdf
Required output format (for generated test cases)
At minimum, produce:
● Use Case Title
● Goal
● Preconditions
● Test Data (if applicable)
●

use_cases.title: UC1 - Successful Signup with Valid Email and Password
use_cases.goal: Ensure successful signup with a valid email and strong password.
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: Enter a valid email address in the email field.
Enter a strong password that meets the strength requirements.
expected_results: User receives a confirmation that an account has been created.
A verification email is sent to the provided email address.
negative_cases: Attempting to sign up with an already registered email

use_cases.title: UC2 - Signup with Duplicate Email Rejection
use_cases.goal: Verify that the system rejects signup attempts with an email that's already registered.
preconditions: User is on the signup page
At least one user is already registered with 'duplicate@example.com'
steps: Enter a valid password in the password field.
expected_results: User is informed that the email is already in use.
negative_cases: Using a unique email not previously registered

use_cases.title: UC3 - Verification Email Token Expiry Time
use_cases.goal: Ensure the system properly handles the expiration of email verification tokens.
preconditions: User has completed signup but has not verified their email
A verification email with a token has been sent
steps: Wait for the verification token's expiry time to pass (assumed to be 24 hours after issue).
Attempt to verify the email address by clicking on the verification link after the token has expired.
expected_results: User is informed that the verification link has expired and is prompted to request a new verification email.
negative_cases: Using a verification link within the valid time frame
boundary_cases: Verification token exactly at expiry time (24 hours)

assumptions: The system uses email verification as part of the signup process.
Password strength requirements are enforced but not specifically detailed in the provided context.
Token expiration time is assumed to be 24 hours based on common practices.
